QVM: Quaternions, Vectors, Matrices

boost/qvm/mat_operations4.hpp

This header defines function and operator overloads that implement all the same operations defined in the boost/qvm/mat_operations.hpp header, but specifically for matrices of size 4x4, 4x1 and 1x4. You can include it instead of boost/qvm/mat_operations.hpp if you know you don't use matrix objects of any other size.

See also: Code Generator
